name: 01-24-2026-sacco-and-vanzetti
title: sacco and vanzetti paper
summary: This paper charts the coverage and opinions of the Sacco and Vanzetti trials from the perspective of the Michigan press to create a model of state-wide sentiment towards the two men. Coauthored with Doctor Giorgio Bertellini.

name: 01-24-2026-new-website-launched

summary: Just launched this new resume website and also finished the finale of Friendship is Magic!

name: 02-5-2026-kekule-to-blood-meridian-language-as-will-and-reality
title: kekule to blood meridian: language as will and reality
summary: A Paper Charting Language as an Expression of Will and Reality Rather than Communication as Relating to the Book Blood Meridian and the Essay The Kekule Problem by Cormac McCarthy. Collab with J-Dawg
